using namespace std;
#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
int main()
{
   int t,n,temp;
   scanf("%d",&t);
 
   while(t--)
  {
      scanf("%d",&n);
      if(n==0)
      { printf("O\n");
        continue;}
      temp=(2*n-1)/2;
      temp += (2*n-1)*(2*n-1);
      printf("%d\n",temp);
     }
  return 0;
 }
